Jazz Client Release 6.0.6

  • All Classes

Package com.ibm.team.scm.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBaselineConnection
    Interface for allowing a client to carry on an extended interaction with a baseline stored in a repository.
    IChangeHistory
    Represents a history of the changes made across all versionable items within a component's change history.
    IChangeHistoryDescriptor
    This structure encapsulates the basic state of a change history era in a single structure, which is fetched & returned atomically from the Jazz SCM Server.
    IConfiguration
    Represents a configuration of versionable items, scoped by Component.
    IConnection
    Interface providing common protocol for managing a connection to carry on an extended interaction with a target (workspace, stream or baseline) stored in a repository.
    IFlowNodeConnection
    Interface for allowing a client to carry on an extended interaction with a flow node (workspace or stream) stored in a repository.
    IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentAdditionOp
    Marker interface representing an operation that adds a component to a workspace or stream.
    IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentDeletionOp
    Marker interface representing an operation that drops a component from a workspace or stream.
    IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentOp
    Marker interface representing an operation that modifies a component on a workspace or stream.
    IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentOpFactory
    Factory for creating operations that modify the components within a workspace or stream.
    IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentReplacementOp
    Marker interface representing an operation that replaces a component on a workspace or stream.
    IHistoricBaselineIterator
    This interface can be used by the client to iterate over a a result set of baselines, which may be too large to return in a single round trip.
    IReadScopeDescriber
    Describes a read scope in a human-meaningful way.
    IVersionableManager
    A versionable item manager for a particular team repository used to retrieve versionable historical states.
    IWorkspaceConfiguration
    This interface represents a cross-component view of the workspace's configuration.
    IWorkspaceConnection
    Interface for allowing a client to carry on an extended interaction with a workspace stored in a repository.
    IWorkspaceConnection.IAutoResolveOp
    Sub-interface of ICurrentPatchOperation so operation type can be determined
    IWorkspaceConnection.IConfigurationOp
    Marker interface representing an operation that modifies a workspace configuration.
    IWorkspaceConnection.IConfigurationOpFactory
    Factory for creating operations that modify the configuration of a workspace.
    IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation
    Interface that defines the input to the IWorkspaceConnection.applyCurrentPatchOperations(IComponentHandle, List, IProgressMonitor) method.
    IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperationFactory
    Factory interface for creating operations that can be passed to the IWorkspaceConnection.applyCurrentPatchOperations(IComponentHandle, List, IProgressMonitor) method.
    IWorkspaceConnection.IDeleteOp
    Configuration operation structure which represents deleting an item from the configuration.
    IWorkspaceConnection.IDeleteSubtreeOp
    Configuration operation structure which represents deleting a folder item and its cumulative descendants from the configuration.
    IWorkspaceConnection.IMarkAsMergedOp
    Configuration operation structure which indicates that by selecting an existing state (or the deleted state) effectively resolves a conflict in the workspace.
    IWorkspaceConnection.IMarkAsResolvedOp
    Sub-interface of ICurrentPatchOperation so operation type can be determined
    IWorkspaceConnection.IMergeOp
    Configuration operation structure which indicates that by selecting an existing state (or the deleted state) effectively resolves a conflict in the workspace.
    IWorkspaceConnection.IMergeResultOp
    Configuration operation structure representing an operation that can be used to merge a conflict as resolved.
    IWorkspaceConnection.IRelocateOp
    Configuration operation structure which represents moving an existing active change from the specified change set.
    IWorkspaceConnection.IReparentVersionableOp
    Sub-interface of ICurrentPatchOperation so operation type can be determined
    IWorkspaceConnection.IResolveWithProposedOp
    Sub-interface of ICurrentPatchOperation so operation type can be determined
    IWorkspaceConnection.IRevertOp
    Configuration operation structure which represents reverting to an existing item state in the repository.
    IWorkspaceConnection.ISaveOp
    Configuration operation structure which represents saving a new item state in the repository.
    IWorkspaceConnection.IUndoMergeOp
    Configuration operation structure which represents undoing of a merge in an existing active change from a change set.
    IWorkspaceConnection.IUndoOp
    Configuration operation structure which represents undoing an existing active change from a change set.
    IWorkspaceManager
    Methods for managing workspaces and streams.
    IWorkspaceManager.IVersionableLockOperation
    Marker interface for locking operations.
    IWorkspaceManager.IVersionableLockOperationFactory
    Factory for creating lock operations to be applied atomically on the server.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SCMPlatform
    The central client class of the SCM component.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    VisibilityEnum Deprecated
    Use IReadScope.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DeliveryRequiresHistoryReorderingException
